meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size
meanings.sent1: The ants built the teensiest tunnels in the dirt.
meanings.sent2: She found the teensiest seashell on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The teensiest kitten tried to meow but only a squeak came out.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as teensiest as a crescent moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The teensiest flower in the garden bloomed with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: It was the teensiest mistake, hardly noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The teacup held the teensiest amount of tea.
meanings.sent3: He made the teensiest nod to show he understood.
meanings.sent4: The teensiest hint of a smile played on her lips.
meanings.sent5: In the vast desert, the teensiest oasis provided hope for the travelers.
